College of Climate Change and Environmental Science (CoCCES), nkè a na-akpọbu Academy of Climate Changing Education and Research (ACCER), bụ ụlọ ọrụ nkè Mahadum Ọrụ Ugbo Kerala guzobere n'afọ 2010 iji mụọ banyéré mgbanwe ihu igwe n'okpuru ngalaba ọrụ ugbo
Ogige ahụ dị na Vellanikara, Thrissur, Kerala, India, ma nwee afọ ise na M.Sc
(Integrated) Climate Change Adaptation na afọ anọ na B.Sc
Mgbè emere usoro ahụ n'ubochi isii n'ọnwa Septemba afọ 2010, ìgwè mbụ nwèrè klas mbụ ha na College of Fisheries (CoF) Panangad, Ernakulam

Mgbè l e wepụrụ CoF site na KAU gaa na Mahadum Kerala nke Azụmaahịa na Ọmụmụ Oké Osimiri na 2010, a kpọfere ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụ n'ụlọ dị na isi ụlọ akwụkwọ KAU na Vellanikara, n'akụkụ NH-47, na GSLHV Prasad Rao dị ka ónyé ọrụ pụrụ iche mbụ
Ụmụ akwụkwọ ahụ nọgidere n'ebe ahụ ruo n'afọ 2015, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ ise, n'oge ahụ kọleji ahụ toro ruo n'ókè ya zuru oke nke ise

Oommen Chandy, ónyé bụ Chief Minister nke Kerala n'oge ahụ, meghere ụlọ kọleji ọhụrụ ahụ n'ubochi iri abụo na asatọ n'ọnwa Septemba 2015.
N'afọ 2020, aha kọleji ahụ gbanwere ka ọ bụrụ College of Climate Change and Environmental Science, a kpọtakwara usoro ọhụrụ akpọrọ B.Sc.(Hons) Climate Change na Environmental Science.
